channel.title: Quick Question!
channel.description: Alright here's the question: How remove an NPC's ability to walk? And also follow. I want to make a monster thats aggressive, and attacks you when u run by with lets say wind wave but doesn't chase you or walk up to you, it only stays in it's spawn spot. Thanks!

item.title: Quick Question!
item.dc:creator: @hitman2009 hitman2009
item.description:
@hitman2009 wrote:

I’ve seen servers with, say, Corporeal Beast. The beast will attack you if you’re in his lair, but he will not move. He turns to your direction if you attack him, but he doesn’t move from his spawned spot.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 14, 2009, 03:27:29 pm[/size][hr]And he uses range and mage attacks if that helps

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Question!
item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

that isnt possible from most experiences coding servers. Once you attack them they follow you, unless you mean a npc that just sits there all day.

For instance a npc that just stands there will walk to you if you use magic on it.

Read full topic
